item.description:
Join us for a day of Polo, fun, and games! August 15, 2009.

You can join us early or join us late - we hope to take this event into the evening.
(Until they ask us to leave - lol)

Bring food, chair, and/or blanket, as well as your favorite beverage.

We want to tailgate.
- Does anyone have a table top grill?
- Does anyone have a canopy?

Some of us are planning to arrive early for set up and plan to stay late for a day full of food, fun, polo, friendship, and games - we hope to set up for volley ball.

We are planning to meet in the Bed, Bath & Beyond Parking lot at 3PM for those that want to carpool, follow as a group, and go early to the event. We are looking into trying to reserve a spot - more information will follow if we can reserve a spot.

The Polo Event is:
5PM - USA vs. Jamaica - $10.00pp

On Saturday, August 15th at 5PM - the Newport International Polo Series welcomes the return of the ever-popular Jamaican Polo Team. The Jamaicans have a long standing rivalry against USA, with nearly equal record of victories in the Series.


Website: http://www.glenfarm.c...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the Bed, Bath, and Beyond parking lot, E. Main Rd. Middletown, and carpool from there. Lonnie's cell: 401-829-8516, Paula's cell: 401-835-1189
